basics.name: Christian Iha
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering and M.S. in Electrical Engineering in the Department of Electrical Engineeringn at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate with my B.S. in Spring, 2025 and M.S. in Spring, 2026.

work.company: University of Hawaii College of Engineering
work.summary: Assissted visiting UH Professor in grading Object Oriented Programming in C class
highlights: Graded and provided feedback to students on a mix of practical and theoretical C/C++ asssignments
Modify and develop assignments based on class statistics and feedback for current and future use

work.company: University of Hawaii College of Engineering
highlights: Troubleshoot software and hardware issues of electronincs in computer lab
Be of service to students using provided computers na

awards.title: International SeaPerch Challenge High School Stock Class 3rd Place
awards.summary: SeaPerch is an underwater ROV competition and community with over 250000 student particpants. The team that I led placed 3rd out of 57 in our class at international competition
